metadata.Title: CVE-2014-7217 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in phpMyAdmin 4.0.x before 4.0.10.4, 4.1.x before 4.1.14.5, and 4.2.x before 4.2.9.1 allow remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted ENUM value that is improperly handled during rendering of the (1) table search or (2) table structure page, related to libraries/TableSearch.class.php and libraries/Util.class.php.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
